Question
========

According to CBS, the average size of jobs among married women in the Netherlands was 0.7 FTE (full-time equivalent). The distribution of this size is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 0.3 fte. Suppose you take 100 random samples of 36 married women each takes, what is the expected value of the mean of these sample averages?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.3 fte
* 0.4 fte
* 0.7 fte
* Unpredictable

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.3 FTE: Incorrect
* 0.4 FTE: Incorrect
* 0.7 fte: Correct
* Unpredictable: Incorrect
